Skill.label: ^2Tip: Level Templar to level 4 to get these gems
^2You need to complete "Breaking some eggs quest"
Flame Wall (Shoot Magma Into wall for bonus dmg)
^5For rolling Magma try to aim infront of the mob.
Frostblink (You can use Arcane Surge here)
Leap Slam (I use this till I go shield charge)
^4Level all gems to MAX level Except For
^5Lifetap - ^7This should only be maxed on RF & FT
^1Do not forget to do Library Quest for Fire Trap!
^1You want to level Firetrap & RF till your swap
^1RF can be acquired via Act II gem shop
Rolling Magma ^5(If you find 4L add Lifetap)
^2Tip: Drop Herald of Ash for Purity of Elements
^2You can use it again AFTER Vitality Mastery Node
^1This skill Section is assuming you are using RF
^0^1If you are stuck and can't run RF go to NOTES
Righteous Fire (You can replace Efficacy /w AoE)
^2At this stage I prefer running Shield Charge
Frostblink Use on rares/blue/bosses for curse
Stone Golem - Required when starting RF
Molten Shell (You can put on left click)
Frostblink (No need to level it up anymore)
Righteous Fire - In order of Importance
Frostblink - ^1Keep Lvl 1 or you die to Reflect
Frostblink - ^1Keep lvl 1 or you die to ele reflec
^2WoC is not needed if you have Exposure Gloves
^6If not using WoC you get 1 Extra Gem You can use
Frostblink - ^1Keep lvl 1 or you die to ele reflec
^7^7^6Act 1 ( Make a templar to mule the gems )
Flame Wall: I drop this once I get Flame Surge
^6Shoot Rolling Magma into the wall for dmg bonus
Flame Surge (Use after boss is ignited)
Nothing Changes. Just Flame Surge Gems
Righteous Fire (You can Swap Inc AoE for Efficacy)
Fire Trap (if you have DEX Issues get Dex on tree)
^1Make sure to READ NOTES For Auras
WoC is only for Exposure till you get it on gloves

Spec.title: Level 1-12 (Make sure to do Vendor Recipe Weapon)
Level 12-30 The Trek to Damage Nodes (If lacking attributes you can get versatility)
Level 30-40 Starting Righteous Fire (Make Sure you did 1st Lab)
Level 60-70 Getting Skitterbot Setup & Finishing Campaign
Level 70-80 Entering Maps & Getting More Damage.
Level 90+ Dropping Purity & Getting Skitterbot. BIG SINGLE TARGET

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030FOR LEVELING AS A CASTER MARAUDER YOU WILL NEED TO USE THIS RECIPE FROM LEVEL 8 - 20 ^7 ^xADAA47https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/640993187435118612/1038120905227911218/unknown.png
Also don't forget if you get stuck you can use my website for most info although it's geared mainly towards Inquisitor --> ^x70FF70Pohx.net For players who want a more accurate set of gear progression feel free to follow my Progress on ^6Twitch.Tv/Pohx ^7OR use PoE Ninja to track my Progress ^6https://tinyurl.com/3zdew4r9
^7Here is a Mid/Late Game Gearing "Guide" to help you in the direction of what you want to use. Sponsored by phlyntv ^6 https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/980646391850360863/1034467004180082778/unknown.png ^7(AS A JUGG YOU Don't Need the Shaper Life Gain on Block Shield)
For Gearing you mainly want PURE Armour Pieces as a Jugg. However during the campaign I'd recommend getting a few Armour/ES or Pure ES pieces for the sake of easy colors. We use lots of blue gems in our build and it can be a pain to roll on Pure Armour in the early game.
Act 1: Vitality
Act 2: Vitality, Herald of Ash
Act 3: Vitality, Herald of Ash, Determination OR Purity of Elements. ^1MAKE SURE TO GRAB VITALITY RESERVATION EFFICIENCY MASTERY
^7Act 4: Vitality, Herald of Ash, Determination OR Purity of Elements ^4You don't actually need to run Herald of Ash after you Ascend to RF but we don't get our next aura till a bit later (This is around when you swap to RF)
^7Act 5: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality, Determination, Purity of Elements. ^1Make Sure you put Vitality on Arrogance or this setup will not work. You can also refund the vitality mastery
^7Act 6-8 Same as Above ^
^7Act 9: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality^7, Determination, Purity of Elements,^2 Skitterbot ^7
Act 10: Same as Above ^
Sometime into Maps: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality, Determination, Purity of Elements, ^5Malevolence ^7 ^4This will require you to have a 2% Mana reservation Efficiency Jewel & The mastery for Detmination Mana reservation % ^7
Deep into the game: ^1Arrogance ^7Vitality, Determination, Malevolence, Skitterbot, Tempest Shield. ^4This will REQUIRE Charisma Anoint
^7~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In the level 82+ Skill tree you'll have to make a decision on if you want to keep "Unyielding" or go "Unstoppable"
"Unyielding" = More Damage (prob like 10% overall) and very generous AoE for clear "Unstoppable" = More Faster, Stun Immune, Chill Immune, Feels much better overall but lower aoe
The reason I bring this up is because at 82+ I drop unwavering stance for some skill points so if you want to retain the stun immune you can go "unstoppable"
You also have a Pantheon Switch at this point. You swap between Brine King & Arakali based on what you are using (major only the minor never changed)

Items.Item: Rarity: MAGIC Smouldering Driftwood Sceptre Crafted: true Prefix: {range:0.838}SpellAddedFireDamage2_ Suffix: None Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B LevelReq: 8 Implicits: 1 {tags:elemental_damage,damage,elemental}10% increased Elemental Damage Adds 8 to 14 Fire Damage to Spells ^4For Caster JUGG Leveling Reading this is going to be REQUIRED. ^4To get started make sure to collect a few Iron & Ruby Rings. ^6Next you're going to Vendor a Magic Sceptre or Wand with a White Ruby Ring & an Alteration Orb. ^6This will get you the modifier that you see on the weapon right now. ^5 ^5You can do that at Level 8, 14 & 20 ^2Tip: Red Gem + Iron Ring to the vendor = Ruby Ring ^2Tip: Level 8 Recipe = White Ring | 14 = Magic | 20 = Rare

Rarity: RARE New Item Abyssal Sceptre Crafted: true Prefix: None Prefix: None Prefix: None Suffix: None Suffix: None Suffix: {range:0.32}FireDamageOverTimeMultiplier2 Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B LevelReq: 53 Implicits: 1 {tags:elemental_damage,damage,elemental}30% increased Elemental Damage +20% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier {tags:elemental_damage,damage,elemental,fire}{crafted}{range:0.5}(35-44)% increased Fire Damage There aren't many ways to get a starting sceptre. Simply getting one affix and crafting the other is good enough to get started. You will usually either craft %Fire Multi OR %Fire Damage ^1%Fire Multi needs to be unveild via JUN

Rarity: RARE New Item Ivory Spirit Shield Energy Shield: 48 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 1 Crafted: true Prefix: {range:0.5}GlobalFireSpellGemsLevel1_ Prefix: None Prefix: None Suffix: {range:0.746}LifeRegeneration3 Suffix: None Suffix: None Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B LevelReq: 41 Implicits: 1 {tags:damage,minion}{range:0.5}Minions deal (5-10)% increased Damage Regenerate 14 Life per second +1 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems {tags:resource,life}{crafted}{range:0.5}+(41-55) to maximum Life ^1You always have a few options with shields. Especially when entering maps. ^6Pure ES = +1 Fire gems OR % Fire Damage (You're trading defenses for Damage) ^6Armour/ES = Good elemental res (shield implicit) ^6Pure Armour = Best overall defenses but not as impactful until you get your uber lab ^2For the non offensive shields there are a variety of stats you can roll. I'll list a few that are good Maximum Elemental Resistance Life Armour High Sources of Life Regen Chaos Resistance Int/Dex
